creator: mike@ds808.net
text:
A // style sciptlet comment with %> on same line comments out the next out.write (...) statement. Consider the following jsp code. ================== <% // This is a comment %> This should be displayed on the screen.
The end. ================== This is the java output. ================== // This is a comment out.write("\r\nThis should be displayed on the screen. "); out.write("
\r\nThe end.\r\n"); ================== By placing the %>, it wipes out the first out.write. The workaround is to place the ending %> on a new line.

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13576 ***
